params.name: _id
params.doc: ID of the order to mark as `ACCEPTED`.

description: > **Note:** It is not possible to change the order status from `FULFILLED` to `ACCEPTED`.

params.name: _id
params.doc: ID of the order to retrieve.

description: return list of orders total amount mapped to each location based on given status.
Retrieves a list of up to 1000 orders, given the provided filters.
Retrieves a list of up to 2000 orders, given the provided filters.

Customer's contact ID.
See [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4) for more details.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Address Line 2.

members.doc: Whether an approximate address is used. Defaults to `false`. In case of `false` a house number is required.

members.name: apt
members.doc: Apartment number.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: comment
members.doc: Delivery Instructions added by the customer.

members.name: country
members.doc: Country.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Country code in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.doc: Entrance.

Special delivery instructions upon arrival to the address.

BUZZ_DOOR,
CALL_ME,
UNSPECIFIED_ON_ARRIVAL_TYPE

members.name: street
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: streetNumber
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually a state, region, prefecture, or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: zipCode
members.doc: ZIP/postal code.

members.name: latitude

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Address longitude.

members.name: address
members.doc: Delivery address.

members.doc: Delivery through an external provider.

members.name: pickupInfo
members.doc: Information about the delivery pickup.

members.name: restaurant
members.doc: Delivery through the restaurant.

members.name: label
members.doc: Label of dine-in information added by the restaurant, e.g. `table` or `booth`.

members.name: value
members.doc: Value of dine-in information added by the restaurant, e.g. `#6`.

members.name: appliedAmount
members.doc: Amount saved.

Discount type.

members.name: locationId
members.doc: filter response to a specific location, otherwise return totals for all locations.

members.name: promisedTimeInProgress
members.doc: Order delivery date and time for filtering new orders count, Must include a `gte:` or `lte:` prefix, for example: `gte:2021-10-26T12:48:15Z`.

members.name: promisedTimeNew
members.doc: Order delivery date and time for filtering new orders count, Must include a `gte:` or `lte:` prefix, for example: `gte:2021-10-26T12:48:15Z`.

members.name: locationId
members.doc: filter response to a specific location, otherwise return totals for all locations.

members.name: promisedTimeInProgress
members.doc: Order delivery date and time for filtering new orders count, Must include a `gte:` or `lte:` prefix, for example: `gte:2021-10-26T12:48:15Z`.

members.name: promisedTimeNew
members.doc: Order delivery date and time for filtering new orders count, Must include a `gte:` or `lte:` prefix, for example: `gte:2021-10-26T12:48:15Z`.

members.name: totals
members.doc: list of locationId's mapped to the total number of orders.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: References to the line item’s origin catalog.

members.doc: Comment about the line item added by the customer.

members.name: dishOptions
members.doc: List of all dish options available for the line item.

members.doc: Line item price.

description: TEST  This is a line item for the order.

members.name: availableChoices
members.doc: List of all available choices for the dish option.

members.name: defaultChoices
members.doc: List of dish option IDs selected by default.

members.name: maxChoices
members.doc: Maximum number of dish options the customer is allowed to choose.

members.name: minChoices
members.doc: Minimum number of dish options the customer is required to choose.

members.name: name
members.doc: Line item option name.

members.name: selectedChoices
members.doc: List of all dish options selected by the customer.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Dish option type.
One of:
DESELECTION,
EXTRAS,
SELECTION,
UNSPECIFIED_DISPLAY_TYPE

members.name: orders
members.doc: Order data.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Order creation date and time. Must include a `gte:` or `lte:` prefix, for example: `gte:2021-10-26T12:48:15Z`.

members.name: delivered
members.doc: Whether the order has been delivered.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc:
Set of fields to retrieve.
Fields that aren't included in `fieldmaks.paths` are ignored.
See [the article about field masks](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/restaurants/orders/supported-field-masks)
for more details.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of orders to return. The minimum limit is 1, the maximum 1000.

members.name: locationIds
members.doc: Location filter. Pass an array of location IDs to return orders with any of the provided locations.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sorting options.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Order status. Currently, it is not possible to filter by status `FULFILLED`.
One of:
ACCEPTED,
CANCELED,
FULFILLED,
NEW,
PENDING,
UNSPECIFIED_ORDER_STATUS

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Order creation date and time. Must include a `gte:` or `lte:` prefix, for example: `gte:2021-10-26T12:48:15Z`.

members.doc: Whether the order has been delivered.

Set of fields to retrieve.
Fields that aren't included in `fieldmaks.paths` are ignored.

for more details.

One of:

members.doc: Metasite id

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Order creation date and time in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:sssZ` format.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Order ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time of order's latest update in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:sssZ` format.

members.name: activities
members.doc: Log of order updates.

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted the order.

members.name: comment
members.doc: Additional note to the order added by the customer.

members.name: coupon
members.doc: Coupon applied to the order.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the order.

members.name: customer
members.doc: Customer information.

members.name: discounts
members.doc: Discounts associated with the order.

members.name: fulfillment
members.doc: Order fulfillment information.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Dishes and options included in the order.

members.name: locationId
members.doc: ID of the restaurant’s location.

members.name: loyaltyInfo
members.doc: Information about the order’s loyalty points.

members.name: payments
members.doc: Order payment information.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Current order status.
One of:
ACCEPTED,
CANCELED,
FULFILLED,
NEW,
PENDING,
UNSPECIFIED_ORDER_STATUS

members.name: totals
members.doc: Order totals.

members.name: order
members.doc: Accepted order.

members.name: order
members.doc: Canceled order.

members.name: order
members.doc: Fulfilled order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Amount paid using this payment type. Only differs from total amount paid in case of split payments.

members.name: method
members.doc: Payment method.

members.name: providerTransactionId
members.doc:
Transaction ID.
See [Cashier API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-cashier/payments/transaction) for more details.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Payment type.
One of:
BITPAY,
BITSOFGOLD,
CASH,
CELLARIX,
CREDIT,
DELIVERY_CLUB,
DELIVERY_COM,
MULTIPASS,
MYSODEXO,
PAYPAL,
TENBIS,
UNSPECIFIED_PAYMENT_TYPE,
WIX_PAYMENTS

members.name: curbside
members.doc: Curbside pickup method

members.name: fee
members.doc: Pickup fee charged to the customer.

members.name: windowEndTime
members.doc: When a delivery must be picked up by. This is the end time of the pickup window.

members.name: windowStartTime
members.doc: When a delivery is ready to be picked up. This is the start time of the pickup window.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the external provider.

members.name: errors
members.doc: Order creation errors

members.name: orderId
members.doc: ID of the order in the external provider.

members.name: success
members.doc: Order creation success

members.name: fee
members.doc: Delivery fee.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc:
Field to sort by.
One of:
CREATED_DATE,
PROMISED_TIME,
UPDATED_DATE

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order.
One of:
ASC,
DESC

members.name: delivery
members.doc: Total delivery fees charged to the customer.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total discount amount.

members.name: loyaltySavings
members.doc: Total amount saved through the Wix Loyalty program.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Total number of line items.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Order subtotal. Calculated by substracting delivery fee, tax and discount from order total.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Total tax.

members.name: tip
members.doc: Total tip.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total order price.
